# 1. æ¨¡æ¿å­—ç¬¦ä¸²

ES6 å¼•å…¥äº†æ¨¡æ¿å­—ç¬¦ä¸²${exp}ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨{}é‡Œé¢æ’å…¥å˜é‡ï¼Œä»è€Œé¿å…äº†å­—ç¬¦ä¸²çš„ç¹æ‚æ“ä½œã€‚

let friends = [
	{ name: 'jack', id: 1 },
	{ name: 'tom', id: 2 },
]
const getFriends = (friends) => `
<ul>
  ${friends
		.map(
			(friend) => `
       <li>${friend.id}</li>
       <li>${friend.name}</li>
     `,
		)
		.join('')}
</ul>
`
var profile = document.getElementById('profile')
profile.innerHTML = getFriends(friends)
